lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Apopse glykeia mou, fengari miso
Mia kounia pou mas paei os ton ourano
As fygoum’ ap’ ti gi, kathe tis pligi
As perimenei os tin avgi
Tout’ i nycht’, agapi mou, ein’ erotiki
Mono gia mas, ola t’ asteria ston ourano
Ftiachnoune varkoules ki’ ystera peftoun sto gialo
Kane loipon oses thes efches, de chora i nychta mas enoches
Zise ta skirtimata tis charas, einai mono gia mas
Mono gia mas
Mono gia mas, ola t’ asteria ston ourano

Kane loipon oses thes efches, de chora i nychta mas enoches
Zise ta skirtimata tis charas, einai mono gia mas
Mono gia mas
